examples.example: 当别人遇到困难时，我们应该主动伸出援手去帮助别的需要帮助的人。

translate.english: When others encounter difficulties, we should take the initiative to lend a helping hand to help other people in need.

examples.example: 我在公园里看到了好多花，还有一些别的植物也非常漂亮。

translate.english: I saw a lot of flowers in the park, and some other plants are also very beautiful.

examples.example: 我有许多爱好，除了阅读，还有别的有趣活动也能让我身心愉悦。

translate.english: I have many hobbies. Besides reading, there are also other interesting activities that can make me physically and mentally happy.
